handleCommand.translateError: an error occurred while trying to identify the translation language.
handleCommand.cmdCooldown: wait a while before using another command.

backupBots.author: Backup of your bots
backupBots.description: Your bots has been removed because your **{{PLAN}}** plan has ended. You can download your bots backup by clicking the links below. Remember that your bots can go back online with our **Free** plan or you can buy a new plan [by clicking here](https://discloudbot.com/plans)
backupBots.footer: Thank you for your interest in our services, we remain available for any additional information, feel free to contact us if you have any questions or comments. â€¢ Sincerely, The DisCloud Team

donatorsTimers.daysleft:
Your **{{PLAN}}** plan will expire on **{{REST}}**. You can renew your plan [by clicking here](https://discloudbot.com/plans). Remember to backup your bots!
At the end of the term, all data from your Bots and instances will be permanently deleted.
donatorsTimers.planEnded: Your plan **{{PLAN}}** has ended, your bots have been removed and a backup will be sent to your email and Discord DM soon.
